dialogues.text: Get it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Domino grabs another beer for him and runs to get the cas (In between this time, Mariachi escapes with Loco.) She returns, slamming it to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you want your mariachi back, come  with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why will you help me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because you know where Moco's ranch  is... I don't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Domino calls her Assistant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You help me, I'll help you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They leave. The Assistant tends to the bar.

dialogues.speaker: ROAD TO MOCO'S
dialogues.text: They drive out to Moco's ranch in Azul's truck. Little do they know, they passed Loco's truck with Mariachi crouche in the passenger seat. He gets up after the truck passes. Mariachi didn't know it was Domino in Azul's truck or he  could have turned around and kept her from going to Moco' ranch. They arrive at the gate and get out of the truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over the gate) Mauricio!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Azul grabs Domino and points a gun to her head. He whispe to her...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Play along...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He kicks at the gate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Open the gate or she's dead!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gate opens and we see Moco standing at a three-quarte stance, flanked with his men on both sides. Azul drags Do in and faces her at Moco with a gun to her head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Domino) I'm sorry he used you to get to me,  Domino.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Azul cocks the pistol.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Azul, let her go and you'll get your  money.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moco, give me my money or I ruin  your clothes with her blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moco signals his men to get the money.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What have you done with Mariachi?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The musician your men confused with  Azul.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (staring at her) So that's why you were busy that  night...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Azul is glancing between Domino and Moco.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...you had that little monkey climbing  all over you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me my money or I kill her NOW!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After all I've done for you, this is  how you treat me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I never asked you for anything until  now. Let Mariachi go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Azul is anxious now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I swear I'll kill her!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No you won't. I will.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moco pulls out his gun and shoots her in the heart. She f limp in Azul's arms. Azul tries hold her up, but she's de Azul rests her on the ground, looking down at her, wonder why it's all come to this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All I wanted was my rightful share.  But you've got to kill everybody.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You feel sorry for her, don't you?  See, that's why you can't ever be as  big as me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Azul slowly looks at Moco.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (aiming gun) Because you have too much heart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moco shoots Azul in the heart. Azul had his hands to his  side, and now he falls to his knees. Moco shoots him agai and Azul dies next to Domino. Mean Dude #5 is exchanging glances with the others. No on seems to be on Moco's side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mariachi is still in Loco's truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loco stops the truck and Mariachi gets out. Loco drives b when Mariachi motions for him to leave. Mariachi watches go then dashes around the corner to the saloon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mariachi runs into the bar...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Domino!!! We're leaving!!! Right  now!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Assistant rushes over to Mariachi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is she?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looking for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mariachi is about to race upstairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She gave the case back to that guy.  She left with him to find you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mariachi tries to make sense of it all for a minute befor grabbing the gun from under the counter and rushing upsta

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mariachi grabs the key to the motorcycle and runs out. Th motorcycle burns down the road.

dialogues.speaker: MARIACHI ON THE ROAD TO MOCO'S
dialogues.text: Mariachi barrels down the road on the motorcycle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moco is walking away from the bodies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bring that musician out here so he  can be reunited with my Domino.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some men go to check. Cut back and forth with Mariachi coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's gone, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Find him!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mariachi rides through the semi-open gate... stopping at bodies. He dismounts the bike and holds Domino. He has the gun in the back of his pants. You can see it w his back is to the camera and men are approaching him. Mo comes for the show.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (good shot) So you're the little mariachi that  came to town, killed my men, and  stole my girl...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mariachi slowly lifts his eyes to Moco.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are very talented.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mariachi stands, hands up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I bet you play the guitarra real  well, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mariachi says nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (raising gun) Not anymore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moco fires into Mariachi's left hand. Mariachi grimaces,  crumbling to the floor. He keeps a tight grip on his hand When he opens his hand to see the damage, the camera can right through his hand for a reverse shot of his face thr the hole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now get the hell off my property and  take your hand with you!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moco is laughing and looking at his men for support, but one else laughs. Mariachi tries to stand, but he falls ba When he rises again he has the gun in his hand. He shoots Moco in the chest. Moco falls back and hits the ground ha He gasps for air... Moco's men gather around him. Mean Dude #5 crouches down check Moco's throat pulse. Moco's dead. Mean Dude #5 stri a match across Moco's face and lights up a cigarette. He  turns and walks away. The others follow. Mariachi wraps a tourniquet on his arm, kisses Domino, op Azul's case, sees the weapons, and rides off with it.

dialogues.speaker: MARIACHI ON THE ROAD
dialogues.text: He looks back at the town behind him, then places his han on the motorcycle to drive off. We notice the metal brace his hand. Mariachi rides into the sunset road. He speeds past a sig "ACU-A 18 miles" "Coming soon EL MARIACHI II"
